data.title: Eastman, Georgia Technology Degree Programs & Colleges
data.meta_description: Looking for the best school to earn a degree in technology in Georgia? Start your search for the top technology colleges near Eastman, Georgia here.
data.text:
2024 Guide to Best Technology Degrees Near Eastman, Georgia

Are you near Eastman, Georgia looking to earn a degree in technology? Start your search for the best colleges and universities offering technology degree programs near you.

The Best Adult Colleges & Careers Guide makes it easy to find information about the schools offering technology and related degree programs near Eastman, Georgia. Get detailed information about colleges and universities with these programs, including the number of distance-offered degree completions and more. In the end, you'll have an understanding of which college or university may be right for you. Click here to learn more about the guide.

Eastman, Georgia Technology Degrees by the Numbers

Degree completions in technology at institutions near Eastman, Georgia have been growing over the past 5 years. In 2022, students completed 401 technology-related degree programs that were offered by colleges and universities near Eastman. That was an increase of 17% from completions reported in 2018.

Top Technology Degrees for Working Adults Near Eastman, Georgia

Franklin University is a top choice for adults who need to balance school with busy lives. Founded in 1902 in Columbus, Ohio, Franklin's main focus has been serving adult students and tailoring education to fit their needs. Nonprofit and accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (hlcommission.org/800.621.7440), Franklin offers more than 50 programs, all 100% online.

Affordable Technology Degree Programs Near Eastman, Georgia

Wondering what you can expect to pay for a degree in technology near Eastman, Georgia? According to undergraduate tuition data from the U.S. Department of Education College Scorecard, the average tuition at Eastman-area's 4-year nonprofit schools offering degrees in technology or related programs is $22,310. The average tuition at similar 4-year for-profit schools near Eastman is N/A, while tuition at 2-year online colleges and universities is N/A.

Accredited Colleges Offering Technology Degrees Near Eastman, Georgia

Earning a college degree is an investment — and earning a degree in technology from an institutionally accredited university is one of the best ways to ensure your education is of high quality. Institutionally accredited universities are held to rigorous standards by state and regional bodies and undergo regular reviews to verify that their processes and academic programs meet the proper standards.

Wondering if a certain college or university offering degree programs near Eastman is institutionally accredited? View a list of technology degree programs at institutionally accredited colleges and universities near Eastman, Georgia here. We've made it easy to find your school by breaking down the list by school type.
